com.mcc.ul
Class AiInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.mcc.ul.AiInfo

public class AiInfo
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to retrieve information that describe the capabilities of the analog input subsystem on a DAQ device. To create an instance of this class, call the getInfo() method of the AiDevice class.

Method Summary

          Returns AiChanInfo for a given A/D channel.

getQueueTypes

public java.util.EnumSet<AiQueueType> getQueueTypes()
Returns the AiQueueType EnumSet containing all compatible queue types for the current device.
If a channel queue is supported, call AiChannelQueueLimitation for the limitation.

Returns:
The queue types supported by the AI subsystem.
